## Protocol Reminder

**Before editing shared files:**
1. Post message to STREAM_MESSAGES
2. Claim lock: "EDITING [file]"
3. Do work
4. Verify
5. Commit
6. Post completion: "RELEASED [file]"

**This avoids conflicts.**
